tool_description: Classifies merchants into standard categories for point calculation and bonus determination based on merchant codes and business information.
error_messages: Merchant not found: The provided merchant_id is not in the system.
Classification failed: Unable to determine merchant category from available information.
Invalid MCC code: Provided merchant category code is not recognized.
usage: Provide merchant_id to get category classification. Optionally include merchant_name or mcc_code for improved accuracy.

primary_category.description: Main business category (grocery, gas, dining, retail, travel, etc.)

applicable_bonuses.description: List of bonus programs applicable to this category
